result.eng: I got the idea while getting up in the morning.
result.ga: Bhuail an smaoineamh mé ar éirí ar maidin dom
result.orig: Bhuail an smaoineamh mé ar éirí ar maidin dom
result.html: Bhuail an smaoineamh mé ar éirí ar maidin domI got the idea while getting up in the morning.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail an smaoineaṁ mé ar éirí ar maidin domI got the idea while getting up in the morning.

result.eng: I had absolutely no idea what to do but she gave good advice.
result.ga: Ní raibh tuairim dá laghad orm cad ba chóir dom a dhéanamh ach chuir sise comhairle mo leasa orm
result.orig: Ní raibh tuairim dá laghad orm cad ba chóir dom a dhéanamh ach chuir sise comhairle mo leasa orm
result.html: Ní raibh tuairim dá laghad orm cad ba chóir dom a dhéanamh ach chuir sise comhairle mo leasa ormI had absolutely no idea what to do but she gave good advice.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ tuairim dá laġad orm cad ba ċóir dom a ḋéanaṁ aċ ċuir sise coṁairle mo leasa ormI had absolutely no idea what to do but she gave good advice.

result.ga: Ní mise a chum ná a cheap
result.orig: Ní mise a chum ná a cheap
result.html: Ní mise a chum ná a cheapIt wasn't my idea.
result.ponchtml: Ní mise a ċum ná a ċeapIt wasn't my idea.

result.eng: I have no idea what happened.
result.ga: Níl a fhios agam beo cad a tharla
result.orig: Níl a fhios agam beo cad a tharla
result.html: Níl a fhios agam beo cad a tharlaI have no idea what happened.
result.ponchtml: Níl a ḟios agam beo cad a ṫarlaI have no idea what happened.
